column4: elo everyone.. just a simple Q....i mount a external harddisk to ubuntu... but i cant create folder or paste anything to the new mounted harddisk...how to go abt it?
elo everyone.. just a simple Q....i mount a external harddisk to ubuntu... but i cant create folder or paste anything to the new mounted harddisk...how to go abt it?
